DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this trial is to assess the efficacy of Metronidazole Topical Gel 1% in the Treatment of Inflammatory Lesions of Rosacea. Treatment medication will be administered as follows: A thin film of gel will be applied and rubbed into the entire face once daily for a period of 70 days.
DOC.brief_title: Study of 0444 Gel in the Treatment of Inflammatory Lesions of Rosacea
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of rosacea Good health with the exception of rosacea Papsules and pustules minimum and maximum requirements Subjects who are pregnant, nursing, or planning a pregnancy within the study participation period. Subjects who have any systemic or dermatological disorders with the exception of rosacea
